title: Jongli
description: A troubled university student, haunted by family trauma and heartbreak, descends into isolation--until an unexpected bond with a little girl forces him to confront his pain and choose between redemption or remaining lost.

title: Borbaad
description: After a heartbreak by Nitu, Ariyan Mizra seeks revenge, guided by his father Adib's wisdom. Their story transforms from romance to violence, culminating in courtroom confrontations over justice.

title: Daagi
description: Nishan, born into a middle-class family, dreams of getting rich fast. While his father urges him to pursue an honest living, Nishan chooses a riskier route-joining a gang in India led by a smuggler. His job: drug trafficking. Meanwhile, his girlfriend Jerin, who remains in Bangladesh, faces pressure from her family to marry.

title: Chokkor 302
description: Chokkor 302 is a crime thriller that keeps you hooked from the very beginning. The story follows a mysterious case full of suspense and unexpected twists. It's a type of film we don't often see in Bangladeshi cinema. The acting is excellent from every character.
